Every time  I consult Dr. Omid, the experience is great.
-Friendly and resourceful reception staff.
-Clean and tidy establishment.
-The Doctor is very thorough , professional and straight to the point. The way Dr. Omid administers shots is definitely a work of art. Would highly recommend üëçüèΩ

originalText.text: My whole family has been going to DR Nikrouz for the past 8 years. He is always welcoming and kind and listens carefully.  He is thorough, does most of the lab work right there, and follows up on everythings.  He has helped us a lot through these years and we cannot recommend him enough.

text.text: My whole family has been going to DR Nikrouz for the past 8 years. He is always welcoming and kind and listens carefully.  He is thorough, does most of the lab work right there, and follows up on everythings.  He has helped us a lot through these years and we cannot recommend him enough.

originalText.text: Great experience with Dr. Nikrouz! Was seen quickly for a general checkup and blood work, and the doctor was very friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. He outlined all procedures quickly and concisely, and provided good answers to my questions.

text.text: Great experience with Dr. Nikrouz! Was seen quickly for a general checkup and blood work, and the doctor was very friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. He outlined all procedures quickly and concisely, and provided good answers to my questions.

originalText.text: I honestly love my visits with Dr. Nikrouz.  From my first visit, over three years ago, to the present, he has always exhibited patience, kindness, and care. His recommendations and treatments are always on par, carefully blending my personal preferences with medical necessity to avoid excessive medications and deliver more holistic treatment plans. I appreciate that he is a doctor that also knows his patients by name, which adds that extra special touch to the patient doctor relationship...keeping the patient human and not just a speciman in a medical practice. Dr. Nikrouz's gentle attitude is also reflected throughout his entire office as evidenced by the kindness and friendliness of his staff. Marisa, who has been there since my first visit, is always ready to listen and aid with insurance questions and emergencies. The Queens office is clean and offers an atmosphere that makes for a calming and reassuring visit to the doctor. Thank you, Dr. Nikrouz, Marisa, Maritza, and all the staff.

originalText.text:
This place is definitely robbery. I visited there to get doctor to give me MRI prescription. And the doctor rejected to tell me the MRI report, unless I came back for a second visit. Okay, that is fine. I came back for a second visit. He literally only talked to me for five minutes. And I received $875 bill!!

Unbelievable!! I can‚Äôt believe I finally came into this kind of doctor in Manhattan after 10 years. Their front desk told me that they are in network of my insurance. Now they asked me to pay all the bills myself?
